cta.title: Turn photos into links in seconds
cta.subtitle: Drop, paste, or upload—copy your link and share it.

longform.title: Why Photo To URL helps your workflow
longform.p1: Photo To URL is built for creators, marketers, support teams, founders, and anyone who needs a quick, reliable way to turn photos into clean links. With a direct upload-to-link flow, you avoid heavy media managers and skip logins. Links are tidy, easy to use in chat apps, docs, wikis, bug reports, and tickets. Teams move faster when screenshots and product photos are instantly shareable without attachment limits or messy previews. Because the links are predictable and consistent, they also work well in automation, QA steps, and lightweight prototypes.
longform.p2: The experience stays simple: drop, paste, or browse; get a link; share. No extra chrome, no distracting ads, no gating. You keep focus on your content while we handle the boring parts of hosting. Whether you are documenting a feature, preparing a blog post, building a pitch deck, or sending a quick support response, a short link beats bulky attachments. For global teams, the interface is available in multiple languages while keeping copy concise and universal.

items.1: Product and design: share UI mocks, component screenshots, and quick visual notes without exporting to heavy tools.
items.2: Support and QA: attach reproducible screenshots in tickets, chat threads, or runbooks; links stay tidy and easy to track.
items.3: Docs and blogs: embed photos in Markdown, HTML, or CMS editors with predictable URLs and no layout surprises.
items.4: Sales and CS: drop proof-of-concept captures or customer walkthroughs straight into email or messaging.
items.5: Engineering handoff: keep build artifacts, error snaps, and regression visuals lightweight for faster reviews.
items.6: Community and socials: use links in Discord, Slack, Teams, Twitter/X, or forums without bloated previews.

flow.title: How the flow works end-to-end
flow.p1: 1) Choose an image: drag-and-drop, paste from clipboard, or click to browse. PNG, JPG, WEBP, GIF up to 5MB are supported now. 2) We upload and return a direct link. The UI shows your URL immediately with copy, open, and save actions (.txt). 3) Use the link anywhere: blogs, docs, tickets, chat, prototypes, and more. The goal is a frictionless bridge between your photo and the places you work.
flow.p2: Each step is tuned for clarity: visible status, friendly errors, and buttons that confirm actions. The copy button sits next to the link, and the save buttons let you keep the URL in your preferred format for bookmarking or automation. When R2 is enabled, links serve from the CDN domain; your images are securely stored with enterprise-grade encryption and privacy protection.

items.1: Keep filenames meaningful before upload; they remain part of the URL and help future search.
items.2: Use WEBP or optimized JPG/PNG for lighter payloads if you expect heavy sharing.
items.3: Copy the link directly after generation to avoid stale clipboard entries.
items.6: Save as .txt for plain text links that are ready to copy and use.

roadmap.title: Roadmap highlights
roadmap.p1: We will deeply integrate Cloudflare R2, providing more user-friendly quotas and management capabilities, along with optional team collaboration, access control, and per-link analytics. We plan to launch features such as one-click delete, preset link styles, and organization-level storage buckets. Meanwhile, we are continuously improving and refining sub-products: circle crop tool, rounded corners tool, and background removal tool, making image processing more convenient.

1.a: Yes, core upload-to-link is free. CDN-backed hosting via R2 will roll out with generous tiers.

2.a: PNG, JPG, WEBP, GIF up to 5MB today. More formats can be added based on demand.

3.q: Can I embed in Markdown or HTML?
3.a: Yes. Copy the link as-is, or use the one-click .txt save for drop-in snippets.

4.q: Do you keep my files public?
4.a: Links are shareable; when R2 CDN is enabled, they are served via the CDN domain. We show clear maintenance messages if storage is unavailable.

5.q: Will there be accounts or teams?
5.a: Planned. We prioritize frictionless uploads first, then add team spaces, access control, and analytics.

how-to-convert-image-to-url-complete-gui.title: How to Convert Image to URL: A Complete Guide
how-to-convert-image-to-url-complete-gui.description: Learn everything you need to know about converting images to shareable URLs. This comprehensive guide covers methods, best practices, and tips for image hosting and link sharing.
how-to-convert-image-to-url-complete-gui.content:
# How to Convert Image to URL: A Complete Guide

Converting images to shareable URLs has become an essential skill in today's digital world. Whether you're a blogger, developer, or content creator, understanding how to transform your images into direct links can significantly improve your workflow and content sharing capabilities.

## Why Convert Images to URLs?

Before diving into the methods, let's understand why converting images to URLs is beneficial:

### 1. **Easy Sharing**
Direct image URLs allow you to share images instantly without downloading or re-uploading files. Simply copy the URL and paste it anywhere - in emails, documents, or social media posts.

### 2. **Better Performance**
Using direct image links reduces the load on your main server. When images are hosted on a CDN (Content Delivery Network), they load faster for users worldwide.

### 3. **Flexibility**
Image URLs can be embedded in HTML, Markdown, or used in APIs. This flexibility makes them perfect for developers and content creators alike.

### 4. **Storage Efficiency**
Instead of storing images locally, you can use cloud storage solutions that provide direct URLs, saving valuable server space.

## Methods to Convert Images to URLs

### Method 1: Using Photo To URL Service

**Photo To URL** is a free, user-friendly service that makes image-to-URL conversion effortless:

1. **Visit the website**: Navigate to Photo To URL
2. **Upload your image**: Drag and drop your image file or click to browse
3. **Get your URL**: Once uploaded, you'll receive a direct link to your image
4. **Copy and use**: Copy the URL and use it anywhere you need

**Advantages:**
- ✅ No registration required
- ✅ Fast upload and processing
- ✅ Direct CDN links for optimal performance
- ✅ Support for multiple image formats (JPG, PNG, WEBP, GIF)

### Method 2: Cloud Storage Services

Popular cloud storage services offer image hosting with direct URL access:

**Google Cloud Storage / AWS S3:**
- Upload images to your bucket
- Set appropriate permissions
- Access images via direct URLs
- Configure CDN for better performance

**Advantages:**
- Full control over your images
- Scalable storage solutions
- Professional-grade infrastructure

### Method 3: Image Hosting Platforms

Dedicated image hosting platforms provide specialized services:

- **Imgur**: Popular for quick image sharing
- **Cloudinary**: Advanced image manipulation features
- **ImageKit**: Optimized for performance

## Best Practices for Image URLs

### 1. **Choose the Right Format**

Different image formats serve different purposes:

- **JPEG**: Best for photographs with many colors
- **PNG**: Ideal for images with transparency or sharp edges
- **WEBP**: Modern format offering better compression
- **GIF**: Perfect for animated images

### 2. **Optimize Image Size**

Before converting to URL, optimize your images:

- Compress images to reduce file size
- Resize images to appropriate dimensions
- Use modern formats like WEBP when possible
- Balance quality and file size

### 3. **Use CDN for Better Performance**

Content Delivery Networks (CDN) distribute your images across multiple servers worldwide, ensuring fast loading times regardless of user location.

### 4. **Implement Proper Security**

- Use HTTPS URLs for secure image delivery
- Set appropriate access permissions
- Consider watermarking for sensitive content
- Monitor usage to prevent abuse

## Common Use Cases

### For Bloggers

Bloggers can use image URLs to:
- Embed images in blog posts without hosting them locally
- Improve page load times
- Share images across multiple platforms
- Maintain consistent image quality

### For Developers

Developers benefit from image URLs by:
- Reducing server load
- Simplifying image management
- Enabling dynamic image loading
- Integrating with APIs and web services

### For E-commerce

E-commerce sites use image URLs to:
- Display product images efficiently
- Manage large image catalogs
- Optimize for mobile devices
- Improve checkout page performance

## Troubleshooting Common Issues

### Issue: Broken Image Links

**Solution:**
- Verify the URL is correct and accessible
- Check image permissions and access settings
- Ensure the hosting service is operational
- Validate the image format is supported

### Issue: Slow Loading Times

**Solution:**
- Use a CDN for image delivery
- Optimize image file sizes
- Choose appropriate image formats
- Implement lazy loading where possible

### Issue: Image Not Displaying

**Solution:**
- Check CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) settings
- Verify HTTPS/HTTP protocol matches
- Ensure proper MIME types are set
- Test URL accessibility from different locations

## Advanced Tips

### 1. **Batch Processing**

For multiple images, consider:
- Using APIs for automated uploads
- Implementing batch conversion scripts
- Utilizing cloud storage APIs
- Setting up automated workflows

### 2. **Image Manipulation**

Some services offer on-the-fly image manipulation:
- Resizing images via URL parameters
- Applying filters and effects
- Converting formats automatically
- Cropping and rotating images

### 3. **Analytics and Monitoring**

Track your image usage:
- Monitor bandwidth consumption
- Analyze popular images
- Track access patterns
- Optimize based on usage data

## Conclusion

Converting images to URLs is a straightforward process that offers numerous benefits. Whether you choose a simple service like Photo To URL or a comprehensive cloud storage solution, the key is finding the method that best fits your needs.

Remember to:
- ✅ Optimize images before uploading
- ✅ Choose appropriate formats
- ✅ Use CDN for better performance
- ✅ Implement proper security measures
- ✅ Monitor and optimize regularly

By following these guidelines, you'll be able to efficiently convert and manage your images as URLs, improving both your workflow and your content's performance.

## Related Tools

- [Photo To URL](/) - Free image to URL conversion service
- [Circle Crop Tool](/circle-crop) - Create circular images
- [Rounded Corners Tool](/rounded-corners) - Add rounded corners to images
- [Remove Background Tool](/remove-background) - Remove image backgrounds with AI

---

*Last updated: December 2025*

how-to-crop-images-in-circle-shape.title: How to Crop Images in Circle Shape - Complete Guide
how-to-crop-images-in-circle-shape.description: Transform any photo into a perfect circular image with our free online circle crop tool. Create professional round images for profiles, social media, logos, and more in just seconds.
how-to-crop-images-in-circle-shape.content:
# How to Crop Images in Circle Shape - Complete Guide

Transform any photo into a perfect circular image with our free online circle crop tool. Create professional round images for profiles, social media, logos, and more in just seconds.

## How to Crop Images in Circle Shape

### Step 1: Upload Your Image
Select any photo from your device that you want to crop into a circle shape. Our tool supports JPG, PNG, WEBP, and GIF formats. Simply click the upload button or drag and drop your image file.

### Step 2: Position Your Image
Adjust and center your photo within the circular crop area. Use the zoom slider to focus on the most important part of your image, and drag to reposition it for the perfect round crop.

### Step 3: Download Your Circular Image
Once you're satisfied with the positioning, click "Crop and Download" to get your perfectly rounded image. The result will have a transparent background, making it perfect for use anywhere.

## Popular Ways to Use Circle Cropped Images

### Profile Pictures
Crop photos in circle shape for professional-looking profile images on social media platforms like Facebook, LinkedIn, and Instagram. Circular avatars create a modern, polished appearance.

### Social Media Graphics
Create circular images for Instagram stories, Facebook posts, and Twitter profiles that stand out from the crowd. Round images add visual interest and break up the monotony of square posts.

### Round Logos
Transform your logo or brand images into perfectly round shapes for consistent branding across all platforms. Circular logos work especially well for app icons and social media branding.

### Testimonial Photos
Display customer or client testimonials with circular profile photos for a clean, professional look. Round images create visual consistency and make your testimonials more engaging.

### Team Member Photos
Create consistent round headshots for company websites, team pages, and employee directories. Uniform circular photos give your team page a cohesive, professional appearance.

## Features of Our Circle Crop Tool

- **Free circle image cropper** - Make circle shapes from any image at no cost, no hidden fees
- **High-resolution output** - Download your circular images in their original quality without compression
- **No signup required** - Start circle cropping images instantly, no account creation needed
- **Private and secure** - Your images never leave your browser, ensuring complete privacy
- **Easy-to-use interface** - Simple, intuitive design makes creating round images effortless
- **Works on all devices** - Crop images in circle shape on desktop, tablet, or mobile devices
- **Transparent background** - All circular crops come with transparent backgrounds for maximum versatility
- **Real-time preview** - See exactly how your circular image will look before downloading

## Circle Crop Image FAQ

### How do I crop an image into a circle shape?

Simply upload your image to our tool, adjust it within the circular frame to position the subject properly, and click "Crop and Download" to get your perfectly round image. Our tool makes it easy to crop any image in a circle format instantly without needing any design skills.

### How do I make a circular profile picture?

Upload your photo to our circle crop tool, position your face in the center of the circular frame, then download your new round profile picture. It's perfect for social media profiles that use circle-shaped images like Facebook, LinkedIn, or Instagram.

### Can I crop photos into round shapes on my phone?

Yes! Our circle image cropper works on all devices including smartphones and tablets. The mobile-friendly interface lets you easily create round image crops anywhere. Just visit our website from your mobile browser - no app download required.

### Do you store the images I upload?

No, we never store your images on our servers. The entire cropping process happens directly in your browser, which means your photos remain completely private. Once you leave the page, all image data is automatically removed.

### What image formats can I use with the circle crop tool?

Our tool works with all standard image formats including JPG, PNG, WEBP, and GIF. You can upload any of these formats and your circular cropped image will be downloaded as a PNG file with transparency around the circle.

### Will my circular cropped image have a transparent background?

Yes, when you download your cropped image, it will have a transparent background around the circle. This makes it perfect for placing on websites, documents, or designs where you want only the circular portion to be visible.

### Can I adjust the size of the circle crop?

The circle crop maintains a perfect 1:1 aspect ratio, but you can zoom in or out to adjust how much of your image appears within the circle. This allows you to focus on specific parts of your image while maintaining the circular shape.

## Image Tips for Perfect Circle Crops

### Center Your Subject
For the best results, choose images where the main subject is centered or can be positioned in the center of the frame. This is especially important for profile pictures and headshots where the face should be the focal point.

### Consider the Crop Area
Remember that the corners of your image will be cropped out. Avoid images where important details are near the edges of the photo, as these will be lost in the circular crop.

### Use High-Resolution Images
Starting with high-quality images will result in better circular crops. Low-resolution or small images may appear pixelated when cropped, so use the highest quality source images available.

### Mind the Aspect Ratio
Square images typically work best for circle cropping. If your original image is very wide or tall, you may lose significant portions in the cropping process. Consider cropping to square first if needed.

### Adjust for Optimal Framing
Use our tool's positioning feature to zoom and adjust your image. For portraits, try to center the face with some margin around it for the best professional look. For products, center the main item within the circle.

### Create Consistent Sets
When creating multiple circular images (like for team photos), try to maintain consistent framing, background styles, and sizes for a cohesive appearance across all images.

## Common Uses for Circle Cropped Images

| Application | Benefits of Circle Crop |
|------------|------------------------|
| Social Media Profiles | Most platforms display avatars in circles - a perfectly cropped circular image looks professional |
| Team Member Photos | Create consistent round headshots for company websites and directories |
| Online Portfolios | Round images create visual interest and modern aesthetics |
| Digital Business Cards | Circle-cropped profile photos look cleaner and more professional |
| Product Thumbnails | Round product images create a cohesive catalog look |
| App Icons | Circular icons are standard for mobile applications |
| Website Testimonials | Round customer photos add credibility and visual appeal |

## Why Choose Our Circle Crop Image Tool

When it comes to cropping photos in circles online, our tool offers several advantages:

- **Instant processing** - Crop image to circle shape in seconds without waiting for uploads or server processing
- **Perfect circles every time** - Our tool ensures perfectly round crops with clean edges and no distortion
- **Intuitive controls** - Easily position your image exactly how you want within the circle with zoom and drag functionality
- **No watermarks** - Unlike other circle crop tools, we don't add watermarks to your images
- **Works with all image types** - Crop photos, graphics, illustrations, or any image into a circle
- **Browser-based** - No software installation required, works directly in your web browser
- **Privacy-first** - All processing happens locally in your browser, your images never leave your device

Whether you need to crop images in circle shape for professional use or personal projects, our circle photo crop tool handles it all with ease. Create round image crops in just a few clicks!

## Getting Started

Ready to create your first circular image? Visit our [Circle Crop Tool](/circle-crop) and start cropping today. It's completely free, requires no signup, and takes just seconds to create professional circular images.

photo-to-rounded-corners-guide.content:
# Photo To Rounded Corners - Complete Guide

Add rounded corners to any image with our free online rounded corners tool. Create soft, modern edges for thumbnails, cards, UI elements, and social media in seconds—no design skills required.

## How to Add Rounded Corners to Images

### Step 1: Upload Your Image
Select any photo from your device. Our tool supports JPG, PNG, WEBP, and GIF formats. Click the upload button or drag and drop your image file.

### Step 2: Choose Corner Radius
Use the slider to set the corner radius (from subtle to fully rounded). Preview updates in real time so you can get the exact look you want.

### Step 3: Download Your Image
Click "Download" to save your image with rounded corners. Use it in designs, websites, or social posts right away.

## Popular Uses for Rounded Corner Images

### Thumbnails & Cards
Rounded corners give thumbnails and card layouts a clean, modern look. Perfect for product grids, blog previews, and app interfaces.

### Social Media & Ads
Square images with soft corners stand out in feeds and ads. They feel friendlier and more polished than sharp edges.

### UI & App Design
Icons, avatars, and buttons often use rounded corners. Our tool helps you batch-edit images to match your design system.

### Presentations & Docs
Add a consistent corner radius to screenshots and graphics so slides and documents look cohesive.

## Features of Our Rounded Corners Tool

- **Free and instant** – No signup, no watermarks, no limits
- **Adjustable radius** – From slight rounding to pill-shaped corners
- **Real-time preview** – See the result before downloading
- **Privacy-first** – Processing happens in your browser; we don't store your images
- **All devices** – Works on desktop, tablet, and mobile

## Rounded Corners FAQ

### How do I add rounded corners to a picture?

Upload your image to our [Rounded Corners Tool](/rounded-corners), move the corner radius slider until it looks right, then click Download. Your image will be saved with rounded corners.

### What image formats are supported?

We support JPG, PNG, WEBP, and GIF. The downloaded file keeps your original format (or PNG for best quality with transparency).

### Can I use this on my phone?

Yes. Our tool works in any browser on phones and tablets. No app install needed.

### Do you keep my images?

No. All processing is done in your browser. We don't upload or store your files.

- [Rounded Corners Tool](/rounded-corners) – Add rounded corners to images
- [Remove Background Tool](/remove-background) – Remove image backgrounds with AI

photo-to-remove-background-guide.content:
# Photo To Remove Background - Complete Guide

Remove image backgrounds in one click with our free online tool. Get clean cutouts for product photos, portraits, logos, and more—no design skills needed.

## How to Remove Background from an Image

### Step 1: Upload Your Image
Select any photo from your device. Our tool supports JPG, PNG, WEBP, and GIF. Click to upload or drag and drop your file.

### Step 2: AI Removes the Background
Our tool automatically detects the subject and removes the background. Processing usually takes just a few seconds. You'll see a real-time preview with a transparent background.

### Step 3: Download Your Image
Click "Download" to save your image with the background removed. The output is PNG with transparency, ready for designs, e-commerce, or social media.

## Popular Uses for Background Removal

### Product Photos
Clean product cutouts for online stores, marketplaces, and ads. Transparent backgrounds make it easy to place products on any layout or color.

### Portraits & Headshots
Remove busy or distracting backgrounds from portraits for resumes, LinkedIn, or professional bios. Focus attention on the person.

### Logos & Graphics
Isolate logos and graphics from photos or scans. Get a transparent PNG suitable for overlays, branding, and presentations.

### Social Media & Marketing
Create standout visuals for posts, stories, and ads. Transparent cutouts blend into any template or background.

## Features of Our Remove Background Tool

- **Free and AI-powered** – No signup, no watermarks, no limits
- **One-click removal** – Automatic subject detection and clean edges
- **Transparent PNG output** – Ready for any design or platform
- **Privacy-first** – Processing in your browser; we don't store your images
- **All devices** – Works on desktop, tablet, and mobile

## Remove Background FAQ

### How do I remove the background from a photo?

Upload your image to our [Remove Background Tool](/remove-background). The tool will detect the subject and remove the background automatically. Preview the result, then click Download to get your PNG with transparency.

### What image formats are supported?

We support JPG, PNG, WEBP, and GIF. The result is always downloaded as PNG with a transparent background so you can use it anywhere.

### Do you keep my images?

No. Processing runs in your browser. We don't upload or store your files.

### Can I use this on my phone?

Yes. Our tool works in any browser on phones and tablets. No app required.

## Related Tools

- [Photo To URL](/) – Free image to URL conversion
- [Circle Crop Tool](/circle-crop) – Create circular images
- [Rounded Corners Tool](/rounded-corners) – Add rounded corners to images
- [Remove Background Tool](/remove-background) – Remove image backgrounds with AI

---

*Last updated: March 2026*

contact.title: Contact Us

seo.title: Privacy Policy | Photo To URL
seo.description: Privacy Policy for Photo To URL - Learn how we collect, use, and protect your data.

page.title: Privacy Policy
page.introduction: At Photo To URL, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our service.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content1: When you upload an image, we collect:
dataCollection.item1: The image file you upload (stored temporarily to generate a shareable link)
dataCollection.item3: IP address (for rate limiting and security purposes)
dataCollection.content2: We do not collect personal information such as your name, email address, or phone number unless you voluntarily provide it through our contact form.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.item1: To generate and provide shareable image links
dataUsage.item2: To prevent abuse and enforce upload limits
dataUsage.item3: To improve our service and user experience

dataStorage.title: Data Storage and Retention
dataStorage.content: Uploaded images are stored on Cloudflare R2 storage. We retain images for as long as necessary to provide the service. Images may be deleted automatically after a period of inactivity or due to policy violations.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.item1: Local Storage: To store your upload history and language preferences
cookies.item2: Google AdSense: For displaying advertisements (uses cookies for ad personalization)
cookies.item3: Yandex Metrika: For website analytics (anonymized data)
cookies.content2: You can control cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect some functionality of our service.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content1: We use the following third-party services:
thirdParty.item1: Cloudflare R2: For image storage and CDN delivery
thirdParty.item2: Google AdSense: For advertising (subject to Google's Privacy Policy)
thirdParty.item3: Yandex Metrika: For website analytics (subject to Yandex's Privacy Policy)
thirdParty.content2: These services may collect information in accordance with their own privacy policies. We encourage you to review their privacy policies.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.item1: Access your uploaded images and associated data
yourRights.item3: Opt-out of certain data collection practices

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our service is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

seo.title: Cookie Policy | Photo To URL
seo.description: Cookie Policy for Photo To URL - Learn about how we use cookies and tracking technologies.

page.title: Cookie Policy
page.introduction: This Cookie Policy explains how Photo To URL uses cookies and similar tracking technologies when you visit our website. By using our service, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with this policy.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners.

howWeUseCookies.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUseCookies.content: We use cookies for the following purposes:
howWeUseCookies.item1: To store your upload history and language preferences
howWeUseCookies.item2: To analyze website traffic and user behavior

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as storing your language preferences and upload history.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: We use Yandex Metrika to analyze how visitors use our website. These cookies collect anonymous information about website usage to help us improve our service.

advertising.title: Advertising Cookies
advertising.content: We use Google AdSense to display advertisements. These cookies help deliver personalized ads based on your browsing behavior and interests.

thirdPartyCookies.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdPartyCookies.content: We use the following third-party services that may set cookies:
thirdPartyCookies.item1: Google AdSense - For advertising (subject to Google's Privacy Policy)
thirdPartyCookies.item2: Yandex Metrika - For website analytics (subject to Yandex's Privacy Policy)

manageCookies.title: Managing Cookies
manageCookies.content: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to refuse or accept cookies, delete existing cookies, or set preferences for certain websites. However, disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our service.

changes.title: Changes to This Cookie Policy
changes.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Cookie Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have questions about this Cookie Policy, please contact us at

bookmarklet.title: Photo To URL Bookmarklet
bookmarklet.description: Upload images from any webpage directly to Photo To URL with a single click!

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step2: Click the bookmarklet in your bookmarks bar
howItWorks.step3: Select an image from the page
howItWorks.step4: Get the URL instantly and copy it!

step1.title: Step 1: Copy the Bookmarklet Code
step1.description: Click the button below to copy the bookmarklet code to your clipboard.

step2.title: Step 2: Add to Your Browser
step2.description: Follow these steps based on your browser:
step2.chrome: Chrome/Edge: Press Ctrl+Shift+B (Cmd+Shift+B on Mac) to show the bookmarks bar, then right-click it and select "Add page". Paste the code as the URL.
step2.firefox: Firefox: Right-click the bookmarks bar and select "New Bookmark". Paste the code as the Location.
step2.safari: Safari: Enable the bookmarks bar (View → Show Bookmarks Bar), then drag the code to the bookmarks bar.
step2.edge: Alternative: Create a new bookmark, edit it, and replace the URL with the copied code.

step3.title: Step 3: Start Using It!
step3.description: Visit any webpage with images and click your bookmarklet to start uploading!

usage.title: Features
usage.description: The bookmarklet provides the following features:
usage.feature1: Select any image from the current webpage
usage.feature2: Automatic upload to Photo To URL
usage.feature3: Get a shareable URL instantly with one-click copy

note.title: Note
note.content: The bookmarklet works on most websites. Some sites with strict security policies (CORS) may prevent image uploads.
